title: Gallery Conversation: Unlocking Caravaggio
hero_caption: Francesco Buoneri, called Cecco del Caravaggio. 1588/90–after 1620. The Resurrection. Charles H. and Mary F. S. Worcester Collection.
short_description: Join us for a look at the controversial paintings of Caravaggio in the context of artists who worked before, during, and after his time.
list_description: Join us for a look at the controversial paintings of Caravaggio in the context of artists who worked before, during, and after his time.
description:
As one of the most influential painters in European art history, Caravaggio was a revolutionary figure, but how can we pinpoint the essence of his powerful style? What are the unique qualities of a Caravaggio painting that have had centuries of followers returning to his work to be inspired? 

Join us for a conversation on the enduring legacy of Michelangelo Merisi de Caravaggio in the context of artists who worked before, during, and after his time.
